Enjoy the Happy Family Time with Your Kids! Enjoy play this musical toys in living room, backyard, garden or playground together with your babies. Establish more intimate parent-child relationships, create an unforgettable happy childhood time for your kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Initial Impression, Awesome gift for Toddlers to Enjoy with Whole Family
reviews.reviewText: You need to have extremely clean floors before using this toy. The wheels will pick up all dust, hair etc that you miss. Once collected by the wheels dust will go inside and scratch up the clear plastic near the wheels. This happened rather fast after the first use on freshly swept floors so I would not say the plastic is very durable.You can remove the bottom screws and clean, but the inside components, two big gears and the engine area with the pistons are just sitting there, they are not secured, so if you aren't careful you will have to reassemble them too. Not difficult just put it all back the same way it was. If you want to keep it clean you will have to do this. I love clear electronics, but I think it could have been made to keep dust out a little better. Like wheel wells that separate the wheel area from the rest of the inside of the car.The car has an auto drive kinda of like a robotic vacuum cleaner. If it gently touches anything in the front it automatically changes the direction it is driving in. It's normal path appears circular. It's motion is a slow cruise so it's not going to run anyone over. You can arrange almost anything around a space to make a barrier for where you want the car to drive, it won't even run over a thick washcloth. The clear plastic shell covers the wheels so fingers will not get caught.It has two different short songs, which are both very cute and loud. We call it "Party Car" for this reason. There is a honking sound when the music changes. Lot's of lights, Moving Gears it looks really cool and impressive for the price. Everyone likes watching it and dancing to the music There is a stationary/silent mode where it only lights up and doesn't move.Even though it's not perfect it seems like the person who designed it was rather thoughtful, which is rare these days. Even the box it came in was embossed with the car and gears. A pack of 3 AA batteries and a screwdriver were included. Batteries lasted about 24hrs. I recommend some rechargeables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Son LOVES This Toy!
reviews.reviewText: The music is a little too loud but the lights are bright which I love. I loved that it came with batteries and a little screwdriver. So you don't have to buy anything extra to assembly it. I wish it went a little faster but the fact that it works and my 1yo loves it, I'm happy with that. He even cried when I took it away which he only does when he loves something. But overall the toy is amazing and reminds me of the see through phone that we had in the 90s.

reviews.reviewText: Great toy but it is super loud

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars LOUD, LOUD, LOUD
reviews.reviewText: Really cool toy, but it won’t drive unless the music is playing too - and it’s SO LOUD. Just a heads up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: Love love this car! I got this for my special needs son that has CVI and he loves lights. This car is so bright with every color lights, music is very loud and even my His big bro loves it. Strongly recommend.And you can with make the car move or not move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for my nephew
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. WAY louder than I expected it to be, it's going to drive my brother and his wife insane. My nephew (1 1/2) is really into cars and trucks and loved this car when he opened it up.It lights up, plays music, and you can see the gears moving around inside of it. It has a sensor that turns it around if it bumps into something. Doesn't work well on carpet.He might get another one for his birthday in June because I know this one is going to go "missing".Great for kids that don't live in your house!
